content: navi ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ the distribution publication translation and resale in whole or in part of these i nstructions and images is strictly prohibited please respect my rights as a designer if you have any questions send me an email xicotetinfo@gmail com thank you very much and happy crocheting ♥ 1 de 7 introduction this adorable fairy is crocheted with 2 5mm cotton yarn fine and the result is 11cm high but keep in mind that if you change the weight of the yarn its size will vary i invite you to try playing with different yarns or add other accessories give it your personal touch let your imagination run wild and you will surely love it if you have any questions remember that you can write to me at xicotetinfo@gmail com abbreviations chain - chain st s - stich s slip_stitch - slip stich single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet dhp - double high point increase - increase decrease - decrease blo - back loop only flo - front loop only r 1 - round 1 2 de 7 materials 2 5mm cotton yarn rainbow cotton 8/6 - white - blue synthetic cotton filling 2 5mm crochet hook wool needle pair of scissors ball with 2 5 mm blue cotton yarn r 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 r 2 6 increase 12 r 3 1 single_crochet 1 increase 18 r 4 2 single_crochet 1 increase 24 r 5 3 single_crochet 1 increase 30 r 6 4 single_crochet 1 increase 36 r 7 r 12 1 single_crochet 36 r 13 4 single_crochet 1 decrease 30 r 14 3 single_crochet 1 decrease 24 r 15 2 single_crochet 1 decrease 18 stuff r 16 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 12 r 17 6 decrease 6 fasten_off with slip_stitch cut and hide the strand 3 de 7 1 2 large wings with 2 5 mm white cotton yarn r 1 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 r 2 2 increase 2 single_crochet 6 r 3 1 single_crochet 6 r 4 2 increase 4 single_crochet 8 r 5 1 single_crochet 8 r 6 2 increase 6 single_crochet 10 r 7 1 single_crochet 10 r 8 2 increase 8 single_crochet 12 r 9 1 single_crochet 12 r 10 2 increase 10 single_crochet 14 r 11 1 single_crochet 14 r 12 2 increase 12 single_crochet 16 r 13 1 single_crochet 16 r 14 2 decrease 12 single_crochet 14 4 de 7 r 15 2 decrease 10 single_crochet 12 r 16 2 decrease 8 single_crochet 10 r 17 2 decrease 6 single_crochet 8 r 18 r 19 1 single_crochet 8 fasten_off with slip_stitch leave a strand and sew to the ball between r 4 and r 6 1 2 3 4 5 de 7 small wings with 2 5 mm white cotton yarn r 1 7 chain 7 r 2 go back over the chain skipping the first chain and work 12 single_crochet around 6 on each side of the chain 12 r 3 12
